summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsSustainable PackagingThe COSRX Advanced Snail Peptide Eye Cream is a lightweight hydrator that brightens, firms and depuffs with 72% snail mucin and anti-aging peptides.
details: DetailsBenefitsDepuffs and brightens the look of dark circlesHydrates the under eye area with lightweight moistureVisibly plumps to provide a more youthful appearanceReduces the appearance of fine lines and wrinklesKey IngredientsSnail Secretion Filtrate: A snail extract that brightens, hydrates, and supports healthy skin repairPeptide Complex: A blend of five peptides that firm, reduce the look of fine lines, and enhance skin brightnessNiacinamide: A form of vitamin B that boosts skin brightness and reduces the look of dark circlesFormulated WithoutParabensPhthalatesAlcoholItem 2561092How To UseApply a small amount around the eyes and tap the area gently for better absorption. Avoid the eyelid and direct contact with eyes.Precautions: For external use only. When using this product, keep out of eyes. Rinse with water to remove.IngredientsSnail Secretion Filtrate, Butylene Glycol, Glycerin, Helianthus Annuus (sunflower) Seed Oil, 1,2-hexanediol, Niacinamide, Water, Palmitic Acid, Arginine, Carbomer, Stearic Acid, Betaine, Cetearyl Olivate, Sorbitan Olivate, Sodium Polyacrylate, Allantoin, Tocopheryl Acetate, Panthenol, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Sodium Hyaluronate, Adenosine, Xanthan Gum, Myristic Acid, Copper Tripeptide-1, Acetyl Hexapeptide-8, Palmitoyl Pentapeptide-4, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-1, Palmitoyl Tetrapeptide-7.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Apply a small amount around the eyes and tap the area gently for better absorption. Avoid the eyelid and direct contact with eyes.Precautions: For external use only. When using this product, keep out of eyes. Rinse with water to remove.

reviews.headline: Not my favorite of all time, but pretty close.
reviews.comments: I have very sensitive skin due to psoriasis, and finding an eye cream that works without irritation is challenging. This cream does a very good job at moisturizing my eye area and softening the fine lines. It does a pretty decent job with puffiness, as well. I wish that it was a bit more brightening, but for what it is and the price, it's definitely hard to beat.

reviews.headline: Love This!
reviews.comments: 55 yr old menopausal women.  I've had this for months,  but only recently opened it.  I wish I had sooner! Great texture,  light weight and fast acting. I'm super impressed.  I should have known it'd be great because all of their products are- and I'm a tough sell!

reviews.headline: Very Brightening
reviews.comments: I did not notice how much my eyes had brightened up until I stopped using this product. I honestly have never thought my eyes were dark until this product lightened up my eyelids and under eye area. It's also hydrating.

reviews.headline: I really love this product
reviews.comments: I love this product. I've been using for a week and already see some brightening coming through. Will definitely do another update in 3 weeks

reviews.headline: BAGS AND WRINKLES BE GONE!!!
reviews.comments: I have no idea who would look at snail mucin and think "hey, I should put this on my face," but I am certainly glad someone did. I use the COSRX Snail Mucin Cleanser, Power Essence Serum, Eye Cream, and All In One Cream, combined with a Mario Badescu toner and a multitude of The Ordinary treatments to form a personalized and highly effective skin care regimen that has made my skin look and feel tighter, firmer, healthier, and younger. On days when I'm in a rush, the Snail Mucin line is my go-to and is effective on its own, but combined with a few Ordinary products, it's the most amazing skin care regimen I have ever used. I have had bags and wrinkles around my eyes since I was a teenager and this is the first product since the Arbonne RE9 eye cream (ridiculously expensive and hard to find) which has given me any noticeable results. Frankly, this is better than Arbonne. I look years younger.

reviews.headline: I love this stuff
reviews.comments: I actually use this all over my face and I love it. This in combination with Geek and Gorgeous A Game 20 has my face smooth and glowing. Please don't ever stop selling this product. For reference I am 55 years old and people often think I am much younger.

reviews.headline: I like it but…
reviews.comments: I liked this eye cream beacauss of how lightweight it was, however it wasnt the most moisturising eye cream I've used. As someone with dry skin and very dry under eyes I was underwhelmed by the lack of hydration the product gave my under eyes. That being said though if you are looking for just a lightweight eye cream then this is fantastic!

reviews.headline: I like it but…
reviews.comments: I liked this eye cream beacauss of how lightweight it was, however it wasnt the most moisturising eye cream I've used. As someone with dry skin and very dry under eyes I was underwhelmed by the lack of hydration the product gave my under eyes. That being said though if you are looking for just a lightweight eye cream then this is fantastic!

reviews.headline: Not a fave
reviews.comments:
This eye cream is very thin and I wasn't impressed with the absorption. I did not notice any significant moisturizing, brightening, etc effects to keep me a customer. 
But my main reason for writing this review is the packaging. Depressing the pump gently provides a tiny amount… Way less than you would use. Needing to do that several times per eye. 

If you press it a little harder, it goes crazy and gives you more than you would need for your whole face. 
What a mess!

reviews.headline: long term
reviews.comments:
I waited to write a review until I fully incorporated into my routine. 
well it's been a year and 5 jars. I can see a difference in elasticity, I wouldn't say I've seen a difference in fine lines but the skin around my eyes is smooth. also, I personally didnt have the irritation that some other reviews mention. My skin seems to really like this one. Definitely worth a try. 
also, the airless pump will get the last drop out.

reviews.headline: Like the product
reviews.comments: Only used a few times so far. Light feeling on skin.

reviews.headline: Is the second time I buy this product
reviews.comments: I always try to use Cruelty Free products for myself and that was the first thing that call my attention, it lasted  a year or so, and I like the way it works on my skin around my eyes, and last but not least: affordable price. I recommend this!

reviews.headline: Nice
reviews.comments: I bought this during the sale for half off. I just have to use very tiny amount under my eyes. I'm not sure of the result of it makes a difference. But I've been using it in the morning and evening for two weeks now.

reviews.headline: Wouldn't purchase again
reviews.comments: I struggle with dark circles and this did nothing for that. For the price, it does what every other eye cream can do. It moisturizes just fine, but no wow factor.

reviews.headline: Worse product
reviews.comments: It made one of my eye swollen this never happened to me until i used this product. I only used it for four days and it became swollen. Do not recommend to anyone.

reviews.headline: Product great, packaging sucked.
reviews.comments: This eye cream is super hydrating and I love it. But the pump started leaking every time it was used and I honestly will not buy again just based on that. Super bummed.

reviews.headline: Terrible
reviews.comments: Made the area around my eyes red and swollen. Now that I've taken it out of my skincare routine my eyes are slowly healing

reviews.headline: One of the best
reviews.comments: So im in my early 40"s and was starting to notice aging in my crows feet area and always had problems with eye creams making my eyes irritated. This stuff caused no irritation all day and has smoothed the area around my eye and no more fine lines i am really impressed. Also the texture is really good

reviews.headline: Meh
reviews.comments: This is thin and doesn't do anything for my eyes.

reviews.headline: Doesn't Live Up to Claims
reviews.comments: This eye cream doesn't do anything for me - it's not hydrating, doesn't address puffiness or anything else. Makeup doesn't wear well over the cream; concealer looks dry after a few hours. Won't repurchase and do not recommend.

media.headline: Carded a decade above the legal age!
media.caption: Bottle

media.headline: Nice!
media.caption: COSRX Advanced Snail Peptide Eye Cream

media.headline: So gentle and no acne!
media.caption: Felt like my skin was more youthful

faceoff_positive.comments:
I received this product for free, in exchange for my unbiased opinion. I am a huge fan! The Advanced Snail Peptide Eye Cream is one of the newest additions to CosRx's lineup, and as always CosRx didn't disappoint. The main ingredient in this product is snail secretion filtrate constituting 72% of the formula. Snail secretion filtrate is mainly known for its skin-rejuvenating properties; it calms the skin, takes away redness, and helps with wrinkles. We can also find excellent antioxidants such as and allantoin, arginine, niacinamide, panthenol, and vitamin E. All help calm and improve the condition of the skin. There are also peptides which strengthen the skin and assist it to function better. On top of that, the formula includes a lot of humectants & emollients, and it's fragrance-& dye-free.

Few words on snail mucin (snail secretion filtrate) production, it isn't as gruesome as media and bloggers portrayed it a few years ago. Actually, no animals are tortured for harvesting snail slime as stressed out snails produce low-quality slime. A few months ago, I read an article in a local newspaper about snail mucin production, as Italy is one of the biggest producers of the ingredient in the world. Snail mucin from Italian snails is in many Asian skincare products as the demand for the component is small in Europe, and it is mostly produced for export. In the article, it was explained how the animals are used for the production of snail mucin. Technically, snails live in a zoo-type of setting; they are placed in dome-shaped, glass terrariums with an absorbent mesh on the bottom. As the snails slither, the mesh gathers their slime. One in a while, their ooze is collected and turned into snail secretion filtrate. So, no torture or harm is involved; the snails are like bees that live in beehives and make honey. 

The cream has a consistency of a bouncy gel. When applied, it stays on the skin and creates a protective layer which takes a bit of time to soak in. Does it work? Absolutely, this eye cream mended the damage that had been caused by Iope's cream. It helps me to control eczema around my eyes, and it keeps my eye area hydrated and fresh-looking. I have some small lines around my eyes, and this product did not vanish them but made them look less prominent. It's understandable as it's not a product intended for erasing lines, but for improving the look of your skin. Overall, the skin around my eyes looks much better when I use the product, and when I don't. I would say that the effects are not cumulative, so you have to use the eye cream consistently; like with any other product of this sort. 

This is a great choice if you want to incorporate a specific product for your eye area, also for people who begin using eye creams. It's perfect for all skin types, there are no particularly irritating ingredients. If you look for a product that improves the look of your skin and moisturises well, then this one is worth a go. Though be aware that this eye cream is not an intensive anti-wrinkle treatment, CosRx suggest it for people in their 20s and 30s.
faceoff_positive.headline: Snail Mucin Is Life

faceoff_negative.comments:
I've used this product for approximately two weeks thus far, and I understand it may take a while to see visible results, however, I've noticed nothing different with my under eye area. They definitely feel more moisturized, but as for brightening and de-piuffing, I cant see a difference at all.
It may be hard to brighten, due to my dark tan complexion, but overall I dont think I would recommend the product. It has a pleasant smell and texture, and is hydrating, but as for the other claims, I would so far say it is lackluster.
faceoff_negative.headline: Hydrating, but not very brightening
